text_block_list.text: It had been a while since Inari One came to Tracen Academy and started training. I was amazed by how fast Inari One was growing stronger―

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Did ya see that, Boss!? I reduced my time a～gain!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Did ya see that, Boss!? I reduced my time a～gain!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: With just a bit of time in the gym, and addin' a little bit more weight, to think the results would be like this…… Hehee, howzzat!?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: When I'm runnin', there were times where even if I used power my speed wouldn't increase, but with Boss' advice, look at me now!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: When I'm runnin', there were times where even if I used power my speed wouldn't increase, but with Boss' advice, look at me now!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: That my speed would start slippin' like that, it all makes sense now! Man, that's impressive!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hahaa, ya don't need to be so humble! C'mon, be proud about that. See, even the sun in the sky agrees with me!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: In Oi, learnin' strength, and at Tracen learnin' precision……kaaaaa～!! Bein' able to experience both, I'm really lucky, huh!? Right!?
――Speaking of Oi, I'd heard from Inari One that the one that pushed her forward to accept being scouted was her 『Chief』 in Oi.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hm? Yeah, I've heard from all the other followers that he's doing well. I haven't really been contactin' him myself, ya see?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: It's the Chief after all, if I contacted him for every little thing, he'd probably get mad and say somethin' like 『Are ya some kind of fledglin' that can never leave the nest!?』

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: He was the one that pushed me forward after all, I need to show him I can stand on my own! I need to be able to do that much if I want to make some big waves!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'm goin' for one more!
――The training was, by no means, easy. However, Inari One was always facing the challenge with a positive attitude and a cheerful laugh.
There's probably plenty of things she's still getting accustomed to. But, she's never complained.
Before seriously starting her training, Inari One had said it.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: It's probably not my place to be sayin' this to you, Boss. But, I'm serious. I didn't come here with any half-hearted feelings.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: It's probably not my place to be sayin' this to you, Boss. But, I'm serious. I didn't come here with any half-hearted feelings.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: You get it right? Lukewarm water is pretty useless! So don't hold back, come at me hard!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: This Inari One, since I came to plant my flag here, I've got no choice but to keep goin'!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: The Twinkle Series…… on this big stage, I came here to win!!
And just like she proclaimed, Inari One earnestly faced her training, day after day, and she's growing. Even if――

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Haa, Haa, haa…… huu…… haa…… ……Hehehee. Howzzat, Boss!? That run just now!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Haa, Haa, haa…… huu…… haa…… ……Hehehee. Howzzat, Boss!? That run just now!
Even if that was something incredibly difficult――

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: No problem! Something like this is a piece of cake.
Just like she ran for me that one time, before being trained, she laughed it off as if it was nothing.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hm? What's wrong, Boss? You've got a real serious look on your face――

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hm? What's wrong, Boss? You've got a real serious look on your face――

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Heh?
I don't want to betray the expectations of Inari One, who came here because she believed in me. I'll make sure she doesn't regret coming here.
For the sake of 『Stirrin' things up』, Inari One had already decided to make the effort.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hahaa, what's up with that!? Ya sure know what to say, don't ya!?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Yeah, leave it to me! I'll prove to everyone in Japan that the Boss' eyes weren't wrong!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Yeah, leave it to me! I'll prove to everyone in Japan that the Boss' eyes weren't wrong!
With a slap on my back, it felt like she was trying to help raise my spirit too.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ……Huu. Glad they scouted me, huh? Expectations……no, trust maybe? Hehee.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (Since comin' here, I can tell I've been getting stronger. ……and I'll definitely get stronger from here on out)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Just leave it to me. Chief, the followers……and Boss! I'll run to the ends of the Earth!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Just leave it to me. Chief, the followers……and Boss! I'll run to the ends of the Earth!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: I'll run and run, as far as I can, and smash through any obstacles in my way!
